name: Infinity Cat - Endless Runner
description:
Great challenges await you in this incredible endless runner game. Dodge barrels, jump obstacles, face enemies and run as far as you can. Run through the map collecting as many coins as possible to upgrade your cat, unlock maps, and much more!

Have a lot of fun in this runner casual game, every time played is a new adventure with randomly created maps. 
play Infinity Cat and have fun!

Unlock new maps to explore:
Unlock new maps and discover new adventures with every map.

Offline adventures:
All this game can be played offline, so you can enjoy the main features of the game anytime.

  FEATURES:
★ Easy to play
★ Optimized for all phones and tablets.
★ Many upgrades to unlock
★ And much more!
